nodes.text: Simonelle was a unique Ingoian replica droid, modeled after his creator, Simonelle the Ingoian, an outlaw droid engineer who also created the Human replica droid Guri. Guri destroyed the Ingoian replica droid, believing she was killing the genuine Simonelle, on orders from her master, Prince Xizor of the Black Sun crime syndicate. Xizor had planned to eliminate Simonelle to ensure that Guri remained a unique creation.
